title: PandorumTeamA LF Gold+ Mid and Adc
body:
Rules

-Be Respectful to your teammates thats all i ask

 

Summoner Name:
Age:
Tier/Division for S4:
Tier/Division for S5:
Main Role and Champions:
Why do you want to join the team?
What do you feel you bring to the team.
List of known weakness.
Are you willing to listen to shot calling:

Team experience:

the team goal is getting to gold 5v5s..so we can have the banner and the free skin. all players are welcome. We would review our matches to help each other out in what we do wrong and how we can fix it. Have Practice to we can have better communication skill and we will have a person shot calling.. if you want to join just reply to the forum or you can pm for addition information.This team will be like family who are willing to grow and be committed. We have 1 diamond and gold person in the team we just need a adc laner gold+
Teamspeak: ts.pandorumgaming.net
Thank you

replies.body:
Summoner Name:Radium xx
Age:Despite being 15 im mature
Tier/Division for S4:G5
Tier/Division for S5:G5
Main Role and Champions:I main both adc and mid but i gues my better lane is adc
Why do you want to join the team?Im looking for a serious team that is good and is trying to advance there own team play
What do you feel you bring to the team.I feel like if needed i could be a great shot caller and with my high mechanics for my level i can help out alot
List of known weakness. I think my only weakness is closing out games when i have a chance
Are you willing to listen to shot calling: I am if needed

Ty for reading, Radium xx

Ign: Const the Ginger
Age: 22
S4: placed into Gold 5, played very few games early then took a break, decayed to S2 I believe.
S5: G2 atm
Role: ADC
Champs: Jinx, Vayne, Sivir, Varus, Ashe, Draven -- but can essentialy play any
Why?: SoloQ is depressing lol. Trust would be so refreshing
Weakness: Can be too safe at times, can miss opportunities to take advantage.

Summoner Name:
Age:24
Tier/Division for S4:Gold 3
Tier/Division for S5:Plat 4
Main Role and Champions:ADC, vayne, lucian, ez, kalista
Why do you want to join the team? Im looking to get into a ranked 5's team and improve my skills as a teammate and a player
What do you feel you bring to the team. Optimism, A no surrender attitude, and a dedicated ADC with great positioning. 
List of known weakness. Objective priority, I tend to get a little confused.
Are you willing to listen to shot calling: Of course, anything that will help me improve.

Summoner Name: xRogue Thief
Age:19
Tier/Division for S4:G4
Tier/Division for S5:G5
Main Role and Champions: ADC Graves Jinx Lucian Corki
Why do you want to join the team? To play with some experienced people and better myself
What do you feel you bring to the team. Good positioning and a good laner
List of known weakness. Over agro and bloodthirsty
Are you willing to listen to shot calling:Yes

Team experience:
Some minor wins in tournaments at my college and online

Summoner Name: ericthmighty
Age: 26
Tier/Division for S4: p1 peak, finished p4
Tier/Division for S5: slowly climbing kinda, placed g3 im p5 now
Main Role and Champions: jng and adc: kha, vi, rengar, panth - draven quinn graves ez lucian corki
Why do you want to join the team? yolo q hurts my ego
What do you feel you bring to the team. calm consistency
List of known weakness. latin girls, good pot
Are you willing to listen to shot calling: yes

Team experience:

Summoner Name: ImTryingToLearn
Age: 18
Tier/Division for S4: Gold 4
Tier/Division for S5: Plat 5 (Elo decayed to Gold 1)
Main Role and Champions: Mid - LeBlanc, Xerath, Nidalee, Azir, Ahri.
Why do you want to join the team?: Ranked 5's is my favorite part of league
What do you feel you bring to the team: Strong mechanics, ability to help other lanes.
List of known weakness: I get too aggressive sometimes and badly deal with being camped
Are you willing to listen to shot calling: Yes

Team experience: Been on 8+ teams, have shotcalled and captained the team for 3 teams.
